text: Kintu yadi tomara tadera talaka da'o tadera sparsa karara age ebam itimadhye deya tadera jan'ya dharya kare phelecha, ya dharya karecha tara ardheka, yadi na tara mapha kare deya athaba tara mapha kare deya yadera hate rayeche bibaha-granthi. Ara yadi tomara dabi chere da'o tabe ta dharmaparayanatara adhikatara nikatabarti. Ara tomadera parasparera madhye sadayata bhule yeyo na. Nihsandeha tomara ya karo allah tara darsaka.
